## Introduction
The name `Monte Carlo` actually refers to a city in Monaco known for its casinos & gambling. 
In the context of simulations, `"Monte Carlo"` is usually used as a synonym for randomness, like the randomness in gambling.

> `Monte Carlo simulations` are simulations evolving randomly.
